curam.util.ctm.bom

Interface ReadAndUpsertBOM

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationConfigReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, AppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, CodeTableHierarchyReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, CodeTableReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, CSSAppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, EventReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, ImageAppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, PropertiesAppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, PropertiesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, RulesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, SchemaAppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, SectionConfigReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, SecurityGroupReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, SecurityIdentifierReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, SecurityRoleReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, TabConfigReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, XMLAppResourceReadAndUpsertBOMImpl, XSLTemplateReadAndUpsertBOMImpl

    public interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
extends BusinessObjectModule

    Infrastructure depends on BOM implementation for every business object that can be transported.

    Infrastructure delegates the responsibility to individual BOM implementation to determine how to read and do insert/update of its kind.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
      Each BOM must read the business object content based on the identifier been passed from the infrastructure, and should convert it to XML.
      void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier, org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
      Each BOM must determine on insert/update on a per-entity basis (for each entity in the business object) whether or not it needs to insert the entity (if it does not already exist), or update it (if it already exists).

      • Methods inherited from interface curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModule

        getName, getOffset, getType

    • Method Detail

      • convertBusinessObjectContentToXML

        org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
                                                throws AppException,
                                                       InformationalException
        Each BOM must read the business object content based on the identifier been passed from the infrastructure, and should convert it to XML.
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains business object identifier.
        Returns:
        xml representation of business object.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • upsert

        void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
            org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
     throws AppException,
            InformationalException
        Each BOM must determine on insert/update on a per-entity basis (for each entity in the business object) whether or not it needs to insert the entity (if it does not already exist), or update it (if it already exists).
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains business object identifier.
        boDocument - Contains xml document representing the business object.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
